baseline_groups.claim_summary: Joint-liability group microfinance loans increase enterprise ownership among borrowers in rural Mongolia.
baseline_groups.notes: Primary outcome. Coefficient 0.0775 (p=0.026) with soum-level clustering.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: Joint-liability group microfinance loans increase sole entrepreneurship among borrowers.
Joint-liability group microfinance loans increase total household consumption.
baseline_groups.notes: Welfare outcome. Coefficient 0.114 (p=0.077), not significant at 5%.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: Joint-liability group microfinance loans increase food consumption.
Joint-liability group microfinance loans affect scaled profit.
baseline_groups.notes: Profit result is negative (-7.85, p=0.076). Direction ambiguous.

global_notes: RCT studying microfinance in Mongolia with multiple outcomes. Primary claim is enterprise ownership (G1). Heterogeneity specs include interaction terms. One spec (robust/fe/soum_fe) failed. Custom specs use different treatment (indiv vs group).
